name: Alamo Splash
directions: Mix with ice and strain into glass.

name: Red Hooter
directions: Pour tequila and amaretto over ice in glass. Fill with pineapple juice, topped with grenadine and topped with a cherry.

name: Blushin' Russian
directions: Combine ingredients in blender and blend smoothly. Pour into glass and garnish with chocolate-covered strawberry.

name: Blue Margarita
directions: Coat rim of serving glass with lime juice, then dip rim in coarse salt. Pour ingredients over crushed ice, shake, then strain into serving glass.

name: Cactus Berry
directions: Shake with crushed ice, pour into salt rimmed glass

name: Blue Cloud Cocktail
directions: Combine ingredients in blender and blend smoothly. Pour into glass then top with whipped cream and a strawberry.

name: Blue Velvet
directions: Mix ingredients in blender with crushed ice and blend smoothly. Pour into glass and top with whipped cream and drizzle with curacao. Top with a cherry

name: Catalina Margarita
directions: Shake with crushed ice and pour into salt rimmed glass

name: Hairy Sunrise
directions: Mix all ingredients except grenadine in a blender. Pour into glass. Top of with grenadine and a slice of lime.

name: Beer Buster
directions: Pour vodka into glass then fill with beer. Add dashed of tabasco sauce then stir lightly.

name: Black Russian
directions: Pour over crushed ice into glass.

name: Bull Frog
directions: Pour over crushed ice in glass then garnish with a slice of lime.

name: Cape Codder
directions: Pour ingredients into glass over crushed ice. Stir vigorously, then garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Alabama Fizz
directions: Shake all ingredients except soda with crushed ice and strain into glass. Fill with club soda and garnish with 2 sprigs of fresh mint.

name: Chelsea Sidecar
directions: Shake ingredients with crushed ice and strain into glass.

name: Diamond Fizz
directions: Shake ingredients with crushed ice and strain into glass with 2 ice cubes. Fill with champagne and stir vigorously.

name: Canyon Quake
directions: Mix ingredients with crushed ice in blender and blend smoothly. Pour into glass.

name: Cranberry Cooler
directions: Mix ingredients in blender with crushed ice and blend smoothly. Pour into glass.

name: Hot Pants
directions: Shake ingredients with crushed ice and pour into salt rimmed glass.

name: Margarita
directions: Coat rim of glass with lime juice, then coat in salt. Shake ingredients with salt then strain into glass.

name: Citronella Cooler
directions: Pour ingredients into glass containing crushed ice. Stir vigorously, then garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Crocodile Cooler
directions: Pour all ingredients except soda into glass filled with crushed ice. Top with lemon-lime soda and garnish with a cherry/lime wedge.

name: Desert Sunrise
directions: Pour ingredients into glass over crushed ice. Top with grenadine.

name: Electric Jam
directions: Pour ingredients over crushed ice in glass. Top with lemon-lime soda.

name: Dry Martini
directions: Mix ingredients and strain into glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon peel or an olive.

name: Fallen Angel
directions: Mix ingredients with crushed ice and strain into glass. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Floradora Cooler
directions: Pour ingredients in glass with crushed glass. Stir vigorously.

name: Creamy Gin Sour
directions: Mix ingredients in blender with crushed ice. Pour into glass.

name: Citron Neon
directions: Mix ingredients in blender with crushed ice. Pour into glass. Garnish with lemon wedge and cherry.

name: Mexican Madras
directions: Mix ingredients in shaker with ice. Strain into glass and garnish with orange slice.

name: Purple Pancho
directions: Mix ingredient and pour into salt-rimmed glass. Garnish with lime wedge.

name: Handball Cooler
directions: Pour vodka over ice in glass. Fill almost to top with club soda then top with orange juice. Stir vigorously and garnish with lime wedge.

name: Harvey Wallbanger
directions: Pour vodka and orange juice over ice into glass. Top with galliano.

name: Long Island Iced Tea
directions: Pour ingredients over crushed ice in glass. Top with cola and garnish with lemon slice.

name: Pink Lemonade
directions: Pour ingredients over crushed ice in glass. Garnish with lemon wedge.

name: Fog Horn
directions: Pour ingredients over crushed ice in glass. Top with ginger ale and stir. Garnish with a slice of lime.

name: Gin and sin
directions: Shake with crushed ice and strain in glass.

name: Rum Runner
directions: Shake ingredients with crushed ice and strain in salt-rimmed glass over ice cubes.

name: Frozen Daiquiri
directions: Mix ingredients in blender with crushed ice. Pour in glass and garnish with a cherry.

name: Frozen Fuzzy
directions: Mix ingredients in blender with crushed ice. Pour into glass and garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Silk Stockings
directions: Shake ingredients with crushed ice. Strain in glass the sprinkle with cinnamon.

name: Tijuana Taxi
directions: Pour tequila, curacao and schnapps over crushed ice in glass. Top with lemon-lime soda and garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

name: Affair
directions: Shake ingredients with crushed ice and strain to glass.

name: B-52
directions: Pour carefully each ingredients into glass.

name: Between The Sheets
directions: Shake ingredients with crushed ice and strain into glass.

name: Buzzard's Breath
directions: Shake ingredients with crushed ice and strain into glass.

name: C. C. Kazi
directions: Shake ingredients with crushed ice and strain into glass.

name: Galactic Ale
directions: Shake ingredients with crushed ice and strain into glass.

name: Green Demon
directions: Shake ingredients with crushed ice and strain into glass.

name: Johnny Beach
directions: Shake ingredients with crushed ice and strain into glass.

name: Kamikaze
directions: Shake ingredients with crushed ice and strain into glass.

name: Lemon Drop
directions: Shake vodka with crushed ice and strain into glass. Dip each side of lemon wedge in sugar. Shoot vodka and bite into lemon wedge.

name: Parisian Blonde
directions: Shake ingredients with crushed ice and strain into glass.

name: Purple Hooter
directions: Shake ingredients with crushed ice and strain into chilled glass.

name: Rocky Mountain
directions: Shake ingredients with crushed ice and strain into glass.

name: Sex On The Beach
directions: Shake ingredients with crushed ice and strain into glass. Top with cranberry juice.

name: Sour Apple
directions: Shake ingredients with crushed ice and strain into glass.

name: Woo Woo
directions: Shake ingredients with crushed ice and strain into glass.
